General.Name: Ottogi
General.Description: Ottogi Corporation produces and sells various food products in South Korea. It offers powders/dehydrated foods, sauces/vinegars/ketchups/mayos, retrot/instant foods, grain foods, agriculture/livestock/fishery products, tea, edible oils and fats, spices, ramens, noodles, and chilled/freezed foods. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Anyang-si, South Korea.
